about_the_game:
The original soundtrack to But to Paint a Universe. Enjoy the soothing music of this magical world. Can be enjoyed without playing through the game.

1 - Intro
2 - Once Upon a Time
3 - Painting the Universe Part I
4 - Painting the Universe Part II
5 - Painting the Universe Part III
6 - Painting the Universe Part IV
7 - Painting the Universe Part V
8 - But to Paint a Universe Finale
9 - Outro
10 - Bonus Track - Clair De Lune
11 - Bonus Track - Under the Moonlight
12 - Bonus Track - Descent
